tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (NP (DT Every) (CD One)) (VP (VBZ has) (S (NP (DT The) (NNP Right)) (VP (TO to) (VP (VB Hear) (NP (NP (DT The) (JJ Good) (NN News)) (PP (IN of) (NP (DT The) (NNP Gospel)))) (PP (IN Of) (NP (DT The) (NNP Kingdom))))))) (. !)))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [has/VBZ nsubj>[One/CD det>Every/DT] dobj>[Right/NNP det>The/DT] ccomp>[Hear/VB mark>to/TO dobj>[News/NN det>The/DT amod>Good/JJ nmod:of>[Gospel/NNP case>of/IN det>The/DT]] nmod:of>[Kingdom/NNP case>Of/IN det>The/DT]] punct>!/.]
